title: Is there any homeopathic alternative for vitamin D and vitamin B12 supplements?
description: Answer (1 of 6): A lot of people do not understand homeopathy. It has now been established that remedies can be measured at atomic levels and has now been described as nanomedicine. It cannot be compared to vitamins. As for whether certain vitamins can be replaced by a homeopathic remedy, I would...
